mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guilds (guild_id, guild_name, joined_time, runs_on_1) VALUES (#{guild_id}, #{guild_name},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT guild_id, guild_name, joined_time, runs_on_1, runs_on_2, runs_on_3, runs_on_4 FROM guilds WHERE guild_id = #{guild_id}

( SELECT runs_on_1 FROM guilds WHERE guild_id = #{guild_id} UNION SELECT runs_on_2 FROM guilds WHERE guild_id = #{guild_id} AND runs_on_2 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT runs_on_3 FROM guilds WHERE guild_id = #{guild_id} AND runs_on_3 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT runs_on_4 FROM guilds WHERE guild_id = #{guild_id} AND runs_on_4 IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY 1
